deleteDataConfirm.title: Delete all tracking data
deleteDataConfirm.message: All your period tracking data, symptoms, and notification preferences will be permanently deleted. Your app settings and preferences will be preserved.
deleteDataConfirm.successMessage: All your data has been deleted.
deleteDataConfirm.errorMessage: Failed to delete data. Please try again.

appLockSettings.title: App lock
appLockSettings.description: Protect your data with biometric authentication or PIN

reminderSettings.title: Reminders
reminderSettings.description: Get notified before your next period
